author: Mikhail Bilenko and Sugato Basu and Raymond J. Mooney
title: Integrating constraints and metric learning in semi-supervised clustering
window: Experiments were conducted on three datasets from the UCI repository: Iris, Wine and Ionosphere (Blake & Merz, 1998); the Protein dataset used by Xing et al. (2003) and Bar-Hillel et al. (2003), and randomly sampled subsets from the Digits
